channel.title: CVE Feed for Westermo -- all
channel.description: The latest CVEs for Westermo -- all products

item.title: CVE-2020-12503|2024-08-04T11:56:52.086Z -- westermo -- pmi-110-f2g
item.description: Improper Authorization vulnerability of Pepperl+Fuchs P+F Comtrol RocketLinx ES7510-XT, ES8509-XT, ES8510-XT, ES9528-XTv2, ES7506, ES7510, ES7528, ES8508, ES8508F, ES8510, ES8510-XTE, ES9528/ES9528-XT (all versions) and ICRL-M-8RJ45/4SFP-G-DIN, ICRL-M-16RJ45/4CP-G-DIN FW 1.2.3 and below is prone to multiple authenticated command injections.

item.title: CVE-2020-12501|2024-08-04T11:56:52.091Z -- westermo -- pmi-110-f2g
item.description: Improper Authorization vulnerability of Pepperl+Fuchs P+F Comtrol RocketLinx ES7510-XT, ES8509-XT, ES8510-XT, ES9528-XTv2, ES7506, ES7510, ES7528, ES8508, ES8508F, ES8510, ES8510-XTE, ES9528/ES9528-XT (all versions) use undocumented accounts.

item.title: CVE-2020-12504|2024-08-04T11:56:52.052Z -- westermo -- pmi-110-f2g
item.description: Improper Authorization vulnerability of Pepperl+Fuchs P+F Comtrol RocketLinx ES7510-XT, ES8509-XT, ES8510-XT, ES9528-XTv2, ES7506, ES7510, ES7528, ES8508, ES8508F, ES8510, ES8510-XTE, ES9528/ES9528-XT (all versions) and ICRL-M-8RJ45/4SFP-G-DIN, ICRL-M-16RJ45/4CP-G-DIN FW 1.2.3 and below has an active TFTP-Service.

item.title: CVE-2020-12502|2024-08-04T11:56:52.083Z -- westermo -- pmi-110-f2g
item.description: Improper Authorization vulnerability of Pepperl+Fuchs P+F Comtrol RocketLinx ES7510-XT, ES8509-XT, ES8510-XT, ES9528-XTv2, ES7506, ES7510, ES7528, ES8508, ES8508F, ES8510, ES8510-XTE, ES9528/ES9528-XT (all versions) and ICRL-M-8RJ45/4SFP-G-DIN, ICRL-M-16RJ45/4CP-G-DIN FW 1.2.3 and below is prone to unauthenticated device administration.

item.title: CVE-2020-12500|2024-08-04T11:56:52.048Z -- westermo -- pmi-110-f2g
item.description: Improper Authorization vulnerability of Pepperl+Fuchs P+F Comtrol RocketLinx ES7510-XT, ES8509-XT, ES8510-XT, ES9528-XTv2, ES7506, ES7510, ES7528, ES8508, ES8508F, ES8510, ES8510-XTE, ES9528/ES9528-XT (all versions) allows unauthenticated device administration.

item.title: CVE-2023-42765|2024-08-02T19:30:24.199Z -- westermo -- lynx
item.description: An attacker with access to the vulnerable software could introduce arbitrary JavaScript by injecting a cross-site scripting payload into the "username" parameter in the SNMP configuration.

item.title: CVE-2023-38579|2024-08-02T17:46:56.268Z -- westermo -- lynx
item.description: The cross-site request forgery token in the request may be predictable or easily guessable allowing attackers to craft a malicious request, which could be triggered by a victim unknowingly. In a successful CSRF attack, the attacker could lead the victim user to carry out an action unintentionally.

item.title: CVE-2024-32943|2024-08-02T02:27:52.185Z -- westermo -- l210-f2g%20lynx
item.description: An attacker may be able to cause a denial-of-service condition by sending many SSH packets repeatedly.

item.title: CVE-2024-35246|2024-06-25T15:03:48.886Z -- westermo -- l210-f2g%20lynx
item.description: An attacker may be able to cause a denial-of-service condition by sending many packets repeatedly.

item.title: CVE-2024-32943|2024-06-21T13:47:48.242Z -- westermo -- l210-f2g%20lynx
item.description: An attacker may be able to cause a denial-of-service condition by sending many SSH packets repeatedly.

item.title: CVE-2023-38579|2024-02-06T21:16:48.926Z -- westermo -- lynx
item.description: The cross-site request forgery token in the request may be predictable or easily guessable allowing attackers to craft a malicious request, which could be triggered by a victim unknowingly. In a successful CSRF attack, the attacker could lead the victim user to carry out an action unintentionally.

item.title: CVE-2023-42765|2024-06-04T17:25:19.448Z -- westermo -- lynx
item.description: An attacker with access to the vulnerable software could introduce arbitrary JavaScript by injecting a cross-site scripting payload into the "username" parameter in the SNMP configuration.

item.title: CVE-2023-45227|2024-06-04T17:20:05.380Z -- westermo -- lynx
item.description: An attacker with access to the web application with vulnerable software could introduce arbitrary JavaScript by injecting a cross-site scripting payload into the "dns.0.server" parameter.

item.title: CVE-2023-45735|2024-02-06T21:48:14.731Z -- westermo -- lynx
item.description: A potential attacker with access to the Westermo Lynx device may be able to execute malicious code that could affect the correct functioning of the device.

item.title: CVE-2023-45222|2024-02-06T21:44:24.769Z -- westermo -- lynx
item.description: An attacker with access to the web application that has the vulnerable software could introduce arbitrary JavaScript by injecting a cross-site scripting payload into the "autorefresh" parameter.

item.title: CVE-2023-45213|2024-02-06T21:39:36.259Z -- westermo -- lynx
item.description: A potential attacker with access to the Westermo Lynx device would be able to execute malicious code that could affect the correct functioning of the device.

item.title: CVE-2023-40544|2024-02-06T21:27:00.798Z -- westermo -- lynx
item.description: An attacker with access to the network where the affected devices are located could maliciously actions to obtain, via a sniffer, sensitive information exchanged via TCP communications.

item.title: CVE-2023-40143|2024-02-06T21:51:51.093Z -- westermo -- lynx
item.description: An attacker with access to the Westermo Lynx web application that has the vulnerable software could introduce arbitrary JavaScript by injecting a cross-site scripting payload into the "forward.0.domain" parameter.

item.description: Plain text credentials and session ID can be captured with a network sniffer.
